DOC.brief_title: Home-exercise Program Children Adolescent Survivors Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: Children adolescent survivor ALL randomly assign intervention group control group . A home-exercise program design 16 week 55 session , combine aerobic , strength flexibility exercise light moderate intensity . The following test perform evaluate effect intervention program : Echocardiography , Tape treadmill test use ramp protocol assess cardiorespiratory fitness , hand grip test ass muscular grip strength , Timed Up test And Go Test ( TUG ) Timed Up Down Stairs Test ( TUDS ) assess functional mobility , sit reach test ass flexibility questionnaire ass level physical activity . The control group perform usual physical activity
